Try this fix - it makes it watchable

http://www.gromkov.com/faq/faq2004-0085.html

Try to open your MPEG video file with MPEG Header Corrector and fix time index table of MPG file. 

You can download MPEG Corrector from here: MPEG-Corrector.zip or from this web page: TechnikTeam 

1) Unpack it
2) Launch MPEG-Corrector.exe
3) Click File -> Open mpeg..., open your broken mpeg.
4) Enter destination file name (save fixed MPEG as...).
5) Click "Fix it!" button. 

That's all.
